trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> objects.
The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection> collection contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> objects.
A <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> object is used internally as the class that represents metadata about an individual configuration property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object to the collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
The collection is read-only.
Removes all <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> objects from the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Creates a copy of the existing collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> class.
Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> object to an array.
The array to copy the object to.
The index at which to begin copying.
Gets a value that specifies the number of <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> objects in the collection.
The number of <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> objects in the collection.
Gets the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object as it applies to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object as it applies to the collection.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> is synchronized; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the collection item with the specified name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
The object with the specified name.
Performs additional, custom processing when adding to the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Performs additional, custom processing after adding to the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Performs additional, custom processing when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> instance.
Performs additional, custom processing after clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> instance.
Performs additional, custom processing when removing the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Performs additional, custom processing after removing the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Removes a <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object from the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
The collection is read-only.
Sets the collection to be read-only.
After the collection has been set to read-only, it can no longer be modified.
Gets the object to synchronize access to the collection.
The object to synchronize access to the collection.
